content: My name is Heming Wang, and I am currently a Ph.D. student in Computer Science and Engineering at the Ohio State University, advised by Prof. Deliang Wang. Before joining OSU, I received my master degree in Applied Mathematics from Unibersity of Waterloo. My research interests focus on speech Enhancement, audio super-resolution and machine learning.
